author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Premium Fund Plans To Raise Share Capital Via Series D Shares Issuance
text:
May 24 (Reuters) - PREMIUM FUND SA:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY ITS SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE ON JUNE 2 ON SHARE CAPITAL INCREASE OF UP TO 1 MILLION ZLOTYS
* COMPANY PLANS TO RAISE SHARE CAPITAL BY ISSUING UP TO 10 MILLION SERIES D SHARES AT NOMINAL VALUE OF 0.10 ZLOTY EACH
* SERIES D SHARES TO BE OFFERED IN PRIVATE SUBSCRIPTION TO ONE ADDRESSEE CHOSEN BY MANAGEMENT BOARD
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
